snippet: The jockeying began after Prime Minister Petr Necas resigned  over a scandal involving a close aide.
abstract: Czech Republic’s governing party begins jockeying to form a new government after the prime minister, Petr Necas, resigns over an espionage and bribery scandal.
lead_paragraph: The jockeying began after Prime Minister Petr Necas resigned  over a scandal involving a close aide.

headline.main: Czech Governing Party Moves to Form New Government
